assets.name: crimson_shard
assets.description: A large, jagged crystal shard with a glowing red core, featuring sharp edges and a reflective surface.
assets.prompt: An isolated, large, jagged crystal shard with a glowing red core, sharp edges, and a reflective surface. The shard is centered in the frame against a fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Positioned prominently in the center of the dunes.

assets.name: ancient_ruins
assets.description: Ruined stone structures resembling ancient temples, with weathered surfaces and intricate carvings.
assets.prompt: Isolated ancient stone ruins resembling temples, with weathered surfaces and intricate carvings. Centered in frame with a fully transparent background.
assets.placement_notes: Scattered around the environment, partially buried in sand.

assets.name: palm_tree
assets.description: Tall palm trees with slender trunks and a cluster of large, green fronds at the top.
assets.prompt: An isolated tall palm tree with a slender trunk and a cluster of large, green fronds at the top. Centered in frame with a fully transparent background.

assets.name: red_sky_texture
assets.description: A seamless, tileable texture of a red, swirling sky with subtle cloud patterns.
assets.prompt: Seamless, tileable texture of a red, swirling sky with subtle cloud patterns. Captured under neutral, shadow-free lighting. Intended resolution: 4K.
assets.placement_notes: Used for the skybox or background environment.

assets.name: red_sand_texture
assets.description: A seamless, tileable texture of fine red sand with variations in grain size and subtle shadows.
assets.prompt: Seamless, tileable texture of fine red sand with variations in grain size and subtle shadows. Captured under neutral, shadow-free lighting. Three subtle variations. Intended resolution: 4K.
assets.placement_notes: Applied to the ground surface throughout the environment.

assets.name: wind_ambience
assets.description: The sound of a strong wind blowing across a desert, with occasional whistling through structures.
assets.prompt: Sound of a strong wind blowing across a desert, with occasional whistling through nearby structures. Desired duration: 60s loop, should loop seamlessly.
assets.placement_notes: Ambient background sound for the entire environment.
